text: The 1978–79 Rugby Union County Championship was the 79th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Middlesex won their seventh title after defeating Northumberland in the final. == First Round == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 100%" |- !width=20| Pos !width=250| Northern Division !width=20|
